sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects use of executionpolicy option to set insecure policies
sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Change PowerShell Policies to an Insecure Level

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects script file execution (.js, .jse, .vba, .vbe, .vbs, .wsf) by Wscript/Cscript

match_context.values: @{EventID=1; CommandLine="C:\Windows\hh.exe" -decompile C:\Users\Public\Libraries C:\Users\RDHJ0C~1\Desktop\paymentconfirmation.chm; Image=C:\Windows\hh.exe}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the usage of "hh.exe" to execute ".chm" files.
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: E.M. Anhaus (originally from Atomic Blue Detections, Dan Beavin), oscd.community

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects non-interactive PowerShell activity by looking at the "powershell" process with a non-user GUI process such as "explorer.exe" as a parent.

match_context.values: @{EventID=1; Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; ParentImage=C:\Windows\System32\cmd.exe; Description=Task Scheduler Configuration Tool; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\Public\Libraries\; Company=Microsoft Corporation; IntegrityLevel=High; ParentCommandLine=C:\Windows\system32\cmd.exe /c C:\Users\Public\Libraries\2034923.bat; CommandLine=schtasks  /create /sc minute /mo 2 /tn "SafeBrowsing" /tr "C:\Users\Public\Libraries\emlmanager.vbs" /f ; Hashes=SHA1=815A050FC4BD12C6CA0B62D38D0FB6F8A95F70A8,MD5=838D346D1D28F00783B7A6C6BD03A0DA,SHA256=8BE433049CCC271F04A8E625E9FB9BD3BCF15B4EDEB63497C00BD9CE1CD5C50E,IMPHASH=7EE4BC5589713B3470B8A950256E2E69; Image=C:\Windows\System32\schtasks.exe; OriginalFileName=schtasks.exe; FileVersion=10.0.17134.1 (WinBuild.160101.0800)}

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert tls any any -> any any (msg:"SURICATA TLS invalid record type"; flow:established; app-layer-event:tls.invalid_record_type; flowint:tls.anomaly.count,+,1; classtype:protocol-command-decode; sid:2230002; rev:1;)

threat_severity.level_description: Severity HIGH because it was considered trojan. Other contributing factor was that it could not be run in sandboxes.
